enumDescriptions.Audit: The Event has been generated as part of Audit type
enumDescriptions.Configuration: The Event has been generated as part of Configuration type
enumDescriptions.Storage: The Event has been generated as part of Storage unit
enumDescriptions.SystemHealth: The Event has been generated as part of System Health unit
enumDescriptions.Updates: The Event has been generated as part of Updates
enumDescriptions.WorkNotes: The Event has been generated as part of Work Notes

DellLCLogEntry.description: This is for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF LogEntry Schema for Lifecycle Logs.
DellLCLogEntry.longDescription: This is for the additional OEM properties to complement DMTF LogEntry Schema for Lifecycle Logs.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Category.description: Property to represent category of Event that has occurred.
Category.longDescription: The value of the property specifies the category of Event.

Comment.description: Property to display any comment that might have been added to the log entry.
Comment.longDescription: Property to display any comment that might have been added to the log entry.

LastUpdatedByUser.description: Property to display UserName of the user that last commented on the log entry.
LastUpdatedByUser.longDescription: Property to display UserName of the user that last commented on the log entry.

PreviousSequenceOfLogs.description: Property to display previous sequence of log entries.
PreviousSequenceOfLogs.longDescription: Property to display previous sequence of log entries.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Created.description: The date and time when the log entry was created.
Created.longDescription: This property shall contain the date and time when the log entry was created.

Message.description: The message of the log entry.
Message.longDescription: This property shall contain the message of the log entry.

title: #DellLCLogEntry.v1_1_0
